nodes.name: updateParticipationBaseline
getConstitution

params.index: The index of the proposal ID in `dequeued`.
params.proposalId: The ID of the proposal to approve.

approve(uint256,uint256).return: Whether or not the approval was made successfully.

params.hash: The abi encoded keccak256 hash of the hotfix transaction(s) to be approved.

params.blsKey: The BLS public key that the validator is using for consensus, should pass proof  of possession. 48 bytes.
params.blsPop: The BLS public key proof-of-possession, which consists of a signature on the  account address. 96 bytes.
params.sender: The address signed by the BLS key to generate the proof of possession.

dequeueProposalsIfReady().details: If any of the top proposals have expired, they are deleted.

execute(uint256,uint256).details: Does not remove the proposal if the execution fails.

params.index: The index of the proposal ID in `dequeued`.
params.proposalId: The ID of the proposal to vote on.

execute(uint256,uint256).return: Whether or not the proposal was executed successfully.

executeHotfix(uint256[],address[],bytes,.details: Reverts if hotfix is already executed, not approved, or not prepared for current epoch.

params.data: The concatenated data to be included in the proposed transactions.
params.dataLengths: The lengths of each transaction's data.
params.destinations: The destination addresses of the proposed transactions.
params.salt: Arbitrary salt associated with hotfix which guarantees uniqueness of hash.
params.values: The values of Celo Gold to be sent in the proposed transactions.

fractionMulExp(uint256,uint256,uint256,u.return: numerator/denominator of the computed quantity (not reduced).

getApprovalStageDuration().return: The number of seconds proposals stay in approval stage.

params.destination: The destination address to get the constitution for.
params.functionId: The function ID to get the constitution for, zero for the destination  default.

getConstitution(address,bytes4).return: The ratio of yes:no votes needed to exceed in order to pass the proposal.

getDequeue().details: Note that this includes unused indices with proposalId == 0 from deleted proposals.

params.blockNumber: Block number where epoch number is calculated.

getEpochSize().return: The current epoch size in blocks.

getExecutionStageDuration().return: The number of seconds proposals stay in the execution stage.

params.hash: The abi encoded keccak256 hash of the hotfix transaction.

getMostRecentReferendumProposal(address).return: The ID of the most recently dequeued proposal voted on by `account`..

params.blockNumber: Block number to retrieve. Must be within 4 epochs of the current number.

getParentSealBitmap(uint256).return: Bitmap parent seal with set bits at indices corresponding to signing validators.

params.proposalId: The ID of the proposal to unpack.

getProposal(uint256).return: The unpacked proposal with its transaction count.

params.proposalId: The ID of the proposal to query.

params.index: The index of the specified transaction in the proposal's transaction list.
params.proposalId: The ID of the proposal to query.

getQueue().details: Note that this includes expired proposals that have yet to be removed from the queue.
getQueue().return: The proposal ID and upvote total for all queued proposals.

getQueueLength().return: The number of proposals in the queue.

getReferendumStageDuration().return: The number of seconds proposals stay in the referendum stage.

getUpvoteRecord(address).return: The ID of the proposal upvoted by `account` and the weight of that upvote.

getUpvotes(uint256).return: The number of upvotes a queued proposal has received.

getVerifiedSealBitmapFromHeader(bytes).return: Bitmap parent seal with set bits at indices correspoinding to signing validators.

params.account: The address of the account to get the record for.

getVoteRecord(address,uint256).return: The corresponding proposal ID and vote value.

getVoteTotals(uint256).return: The yes, no, and abstain vote totals.

params.hash: The abi encoded keccak256 hash of the hotfix transaction.

params._approver: The address that needs to approve proposals to move to the referendum stage.
params._concurrentProposals: The number of proposals to dequeue at once.
params._dequeueFrequency: The number of seconds before the next batch of proposals can be  dequeued.
params._minDeposit: The minimum Celo Gold deposit needed to make a proposal.
params._queueExpiry: The number of seconds a proposal can stay in the queue before expiring.
params.approvalStageDuration: The number of seconds the approver has to approve a proposal  after it is dequeued.
params.baselineQuorumFactor: The proportion of the baseline that constitutes quorum.
params.baselineUpdateFactor: The weight of the new participation in the baseline update rule.
params.executionStageDuration: The number of seconds users have to execute a passed proposal  after the referendum stage ends.
params.participationBaseline: The initial value of the participation baseline.
params.referendumStageDuration: The number of seconds users have to vote on a dequeued proposal  after the approval stage ends.
params.registryAddress: The address of the registry contract.

isApproved(uint256).return: Whether or not the proposal has been approved.

params.index: The index of the proposal ID in `dequeued`.

isDequeuedProposalExpired(uint256).return: Whether or not the dequeued proposal has expired.

params.hash: The abi encoded keccak256 hash of the hotfix transaction.

isHotfixPassing(bytes32).return: Whether validator whitelist tally >= validator byzantine quorum

params.hash: The abi encoded keccak256 hash of the hotfix transaction(s) to be whitelisted.
params.whitelister: Address to check whitelist status of.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

isProposalPassing(uint256).return: Whether or not the proposal is passing.

isQueued(uint256).return: Whether or not the proposal is in the queue.

isQueuedProposalExpired(uint256).return: Whether or not the dequeued proposal has expired.

isVoting(address).return: Whether or not the account is voting on proposals.

numberValidatorsInCurrentSet().return: Size of the current elected validator set.

params.blockNumber: Block number to retrieve the validator set from.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.hash: The hash of the hotfix to be prepared.

proposalExists(uint256).return: Whether or not the proposal exists.

propose(uint256[],address[],bytes,uint25.details: The minimum deposit must be included with the proposal, returned if/when the proposal is  dequeued.

params.data: The concatenated data to be included in the proposed transactions.
params.dataLengths: The lengths of each transaction's data.
params.destinations: The destination addresses of the proposed transactions.
params.values: The values of Celo Gold to be sent in the proposed transactions.

propose(uint256[],address[],bytes,uint25.return: The ID of the newly proposed proposal.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

revokeUpvote(uint256,uint256).details: Provide 0 for `lesser`/`greater` when the proposal will be at the tail/head of the queue.

params.greater: The ID of the proposal that will be just ahead of the previously upvoted  proposal in the queue.
params.lesser: The ID of the proposal that will be just behind the previously upvoted proposal  in the queue.

revokeUpvote(uint256,uint256).return: Whether or not the upvote was revoked successfully.

params.approvalStageDuration: The number of seconds proposals stay in the approval stage.

params._approver: The address that has permission to approve proposals in the approval stage.

params._concurrentProposals: The number of proposals to dequeue at at a time.

setConstitution(address,bytes4,uint256).details: If no constitution is explicitly set the default is a simple majority, i.e. 1:2.

params.destination: The destination of proposals for which this threshold should apply.
params.functionId: The function ID of proposals for which this threshold should apply. Zero  will set the default.

params._dequeueFrequency: The number of seconds before the next batch of proposals can be  dequeued.

params.executionStageDuration: The number of seconds proposals stay in the execution stage.

params._minDeposit: The minimum Celo Gold deposit needed to make a proposal.

params.participationFloor: The value at which the baseline is floored.

params._queueExpiry: The number of seconds a proposal can stay in the queue before expiring.

params.referendumStageDuration: The number of seconds proposals stay in the referendum stage.

params.registryAddress: The address of a registry contract for routing to other contracts.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upvote(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Provide 0 for `lesser`/`greater` when the proposal will be at the tail/head of the queue.Reverts if the account has already upvoted a proposal in the queue.

params.greater: The ID of the proposal that will be just ahead `proposalId` in the queue.
params.lesser: The ID of the proposal that will be just behind `proposalId` in the queue.
params.proposalId: The ID of the proposal to upvote.

upvote(uint256,uint256,uint256).return: Whether or not the upvote was made successfully.

params.index: Index of requested validator in the validator set.

validatorSignerAddressFromCurrentSet(uin.return: Address of validator at the requested index.

params.blockNumber: Block number to retrieve the validator set from.
params.index: Index of requested validator in the validator set.

validatorSignerAddressFromSet(uint256,ui.return: Address of validator at the requested index.

params.index: The index of the proposal ID in `dequeued`.
params.proposalId: The ID of the proposal to vote on.
params.value: Whether to vote yes, no, or abstain.

vote(uint256,uint256,uint8).return: Whether or not the vote was cast successfully.

params.hash: The abi encoded keccak256 hash of the hotfix transaction(s) to be whitelisted.

withdraw().return: Whether or not the withdraw was successful.

devdoc.title: A contract for making, passing, and executing on-chain governance proposals.

approve(uint256,uint256).notice: Approves a proposal in the approval stage.

approveHotfix(bytes32).notice: Approves the hash of a hotfix transaction(s).

checkProofOfPossession(address,bytes,byt.notice: Checks a BLS proof of possession.

dequeueProposalsIfReady().notice: Removes the proposals with the most upvotes from the queue, moving them to the  approval stage.

execute(uint256,uint256).notice: Executes a proposal in the execution stage, removing it from `dequeued`.

fractionMulExp(uint256,uint256,uint256,u.notice: calculate a * b^x for fractions a, b to `decimals` precision

getApprovalStageDuration().notice: Returns the number of seconds proposals stay in approval stage.

getBlockNumberFromHeader(bytes).notice: Parses block number out of header.

getConstitution(address,bytes4).notice: Returns the constitution for a particular destination and function ID.

getEpochNumber().notice: Returns the epoch number at a block.

getEpochNumberOfBlock(uint256).notice: Returns the epoch number at a block.

getEpochSize().notice: Returns the current epoch size in blocks.

getExecutionStageDuration().notice: Returns the number of seconds proposals stay in the execution stage.

getMostRecentReferendumProposal(address).notice: Returns the ID of the most recently dequeued proposal voted on by `account`.

getParentSealBitmap(uint256).notice: Gets the parent seal bitmap from the header at the given block number.

getProposal(uint256).notice: Returns an unpacked proposal struct with its transaction count.

getProposalStage(uint256).notice: Returns stage of governance process given proposal is in

getProposalTransaction(uint256,uint256).notice: Returns a specified transaction in a proposal.

getQueue().notice: Returns the proposal ID and upvote total for all queued proposals.

getQueueLength().notice: Returns the number of proposals in the queue.

getReferendumStageDuration().notice: Returns the number of seconds proposals stay in the referendum stage.

getUpvoteRecord(address).notice: Returns the ID of the proposal upvoted by `account` and the weight of that upvote.

getUpvotes(uint256).notice: Returns the number of upvotes the queued proposal has received.

getVerifiedSealBitmapFromHeader(bytes).notice: Verifies the BLS signature on the header and returns the seal bitmap. The validator set used for verification is retrieved based on the parent hash field of the header.  If the parent hash is not in the blockchain, verification fails.

getVoteRecord(address,uint256).notice: Returns an accounts vote record on a particular index in `dequeued`.

getVoteTotals(uint256).notice: Returns the referendum vote totals for a proposal.

hotfixWhitelistValidatorTally(bytes32).notice: Returns number of validators from current set which have whitelisted the given hotfix.

initialize(address,address,uint256,uint2.notice: Used in place of the constructor to allow the contract to be upgradable via proxy.

isApproved(uint256).notice: Returns whether or not a proposal has been approved.

isDequeuedProposal(uint256,uint256).notice: Returns whether a proposal is dequeued at the given index.

isDequeuedProposalExpired(uint256).notice: Returns whether or not a dequeued proposal has expired.

isHotfixPassing(bytes32).notice: Checks if a byzantine quorum of validators has whitelisted the given hotfix.

isHotfixWhitelistedBy(bytes32,address).notice: Returns whether given hotfix hash has been whitelisted by given address.

isProposalPassing(uint256).notice: Returns whether or not a particular proposal is passing according to the constitution  and the participation levels.

isQueued(uint256).notice: Returns whether or not a proposal is in the queue.

isQueuedProposalExpired(uint256).notice: Returns whether or not a queued proposal has expired.

isVoting(address).notice: Returns whether or not a particular account is voting on proposals.

minQuorumSize(uint256).notice: Returns the minimum number of required signers for a given block number.

minQuorumSizeInCurrentSet().notice: Computes byzantine quorum from current validator set size

numberValidatorsInCurrentSet().notice: Gets the size of the current elected validator set.

numberValidatorsInSet(uint256).notice: Gets the size of the validator set that must sign the given block number.

prepareHotfix(bytes32).notice: Gives hotfix a prepared epoch for execution.

proposalExists(uint256).notice: Returns whether or not a proposal exists.

propose(uint256[],address[],bytes,uint25.notice: Creates a new proposal and adds it to end of the queue with no upvotes.

revokeUpvote(uint256,uint256).notice: Revokes an upvote on a queued proposal.

setApprovalStageDuration(uint256).notice: Updates the number of seconds proposals stay in the approval stage.

setApprover(address).notice: Updates the address that has permission to approve proposals in the approval stage.

setBaselineQuorumFactor(uint256).notice: Updates the proportion of the baseline that constitutes quorum.

setBaselineUpdateFactor(uint256).notice: Updates the weight of the new participation in the baseline update rule.

setConcurrentProposals(uint256).notice: Updates the number of proposals to dequeue at a time.

setConstitution(address,bytes4,uint256).notice: Updates the ratio of yes:yes+no votes needed for a specific class of proposals to pass.

setDequeueFrequency(uint256).notice: Updates the minimum number of seconds before the next batch of proposals can be  dequeued.

setExecutionStageDuration(uint256).notice: Updates the number of seconds proposals stay in the execution stage.

setMinDeposit(uint256).notice: Updates the minimum deposit needed to make a proposal.

setParticipationFloor(uint256).notice: Updates the floor of the participation baseline.

setQueueExpiry(uint256).notice: Updates the number of seconds before a queued proposal expires.

setReferendumStageDuration(uint256).notice: Updates the number of seconds proposals stay in the referendum stage.

setRegistry(address).notice: Updates the address pointing to a Registry contract.

validatorSignerAddressFromCurrentSet(uin.notice: Gets a validator address from the current validator set.

validatorSignerAddressFromSet(uint256,ui.notice: Gets a validator address from the validator set at the given block number.

vote(uint256,uint256,uint8).notice: Votes on a proposal in the referendum stage.

whitelistHotfix(bytes32).notice: Whitelists the hash of a hotfix transaction(s).
